sub_title: Retired IT Business Analyst and Project Manager at Signify
summary:
Currently I am enjoying my pension retirement and not available for any jobs!

Former area: ICT Project Management, Manufacturing Execution Systems (Proficy, SAP-ME/Visiprise), Factory Preperations Systems (CADMaps), LIMS, Data Center migration

Skills: ICT Project Management, System Management, Application Management, Service and change management, Resource Management. 

Knowledge area: Supply chain applications, ERP systems (SAP, MFG/Pro), CAMQ, Business Engine, Webplan, eMatrix, Business Objects (Crystal Reports), MWare, Proficy Plant Applications, Historian, SAP-ME/Visiprise, network, Data Center, VMware, server and application migrations, LIMS (LabWare)

Specialties: manufacturing execution systems and other manufacturing applications

company.name: Philips Corporate Staff & Services. Corporate IT, IT Infrastructure & Operations

profile_positions.description:
Currently working as a project manager/coordinator of: 
- projects to improve the reliability and effectiveness of IT systems in the area of manufacturing at several Philips sites in Europe. Subjects of these projects are improvements regarding hardware/infrastructure, manufacturing related applications, ITIL processes and interfacing to ISA 95 level 4 (ERP) and to level 0,1,2 (SCADA, PLC's, etc).
- Data Center Refresh projects (Maarheeze, Aachen, Winterswijk). Replacing hardware by VMware VRTX boxes, virtualizing servers, fresh installing applications and implementing state of the art storage and back-up solutions in cooperation with our DC provider. Migrating servers (V2V, P2V) and applications focused on manufacturing.
- Windows 2003 upgrade trajects for Philips manufacturing sites (global)
- Tech Lead role in P2FG LIMS program (lead deployment in Aachen)
profile_positions.title: Senior IT Specialist
